divs: sighting detailsthis will be a poor but true repot. my grandmother, now deceased, used to fly to las veags with my grandfather. atlantic city had not yet opened their casions. it had to be the 70s. my grandmother looked out the window and saw two silver discs rotating, in opposite directions, one clockwise, the other-counter. she could hardly believe it. she didn't want to take her eyes off it and tried to wake my grandfather to see it without keeping her eyes off the objects. by the timw he woke, they were gone. quickly. interestingly, she didn't want to tell anyone because she feared they would think she was nuts. she told me when i was in my late teens\early 20s (maybe around 1980) because i had become interested in such stuff. maybe close encounters had recently come out?? anyway, she was sure of what she saw.
